text:
We are committed to include camera-ready paper submitted to iCMS2021 in our e-Proceeding book to ensure all authors can benefit from them. Attached is the iCMS 2021 e-Proceedings.

Publisher : Universiti Teknologi MARA Kedah Branch
e-ISBN : 978-967-xxxx-xx-x

Selected papers will be considered for publication in the selected journals as listed below.

Publication Opportunities:


Voice of Academia (VoA)

Austrian Journal of Statistics

Romanian Statistical Review

Journal of Applied Mathematics and Computational Intelligence (AMCI)

Journal of Creative Practices in Language Learning and Teaching (CPLT)

Malaysian Journal of Fundamental and Applied Sciences (MJFAS)

Journal of Information and Communication Technology (JICT)


Selected authors will be invited to prepare an extended version of their paper (more than 30% changes), which will be published after editorial board & evaluators approval and additional cost may apply.

Author will need to follow the template provided by the selected journal.

title: iCMS 2024
text:
The International Conference on Computing, Statistics, and Mathematics (iCMS) has been a biennial gathering since its inception in 2013, and we are thrilled to announce the upcoming iCMS 2025, marking our fifth conference after the successful iCMS 2021. Organized by the Faculty of Computer and Mathematical Sciences at Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Kedah, Malaysia, iCMS continues to be a key forum focusing on the disciplines of computing, mathematics, and statistics, exploring their applications and advancements.

Throughout the years, iCMS has consistently attracted high-quality papers from both local and global contributors, covering a diverse range of subjects within these three domains. Notably, iCMS 2017 achieved significant success with all presented papers published in indexed journals and proceedings. In the subsequent iCMS 2019, over 100 papers were accepted, with a substantial portion published in Scopus indexed journals, and the rest in various other suitable indexed journals.

The organizing committee has also successfully hosted pre-conference workshops, such as the ‚ÄúVisualization of Tidy Data,‚Äù conducted by the internationally renowned expert, Dr.¬†Matthias Templ from Statistics Austria and Vienna University of Technology, garnering positive feedback from participants.

In our previous conference, iCMS 2021, we celebrated a significant milestone and expanded our offerings with the successful inclusion of two pre-conference workshops. Pre-Conference Workshop 1, titled ‚ÄúPredictive Analytics using IBM SPSS Modeller 18‚Äù was conducted by Prof.¬†Dr.¬†Yap Bee Wah from the Institute for Big Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence at Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Shah Alam. Prof.¬†Dr.¬†Yap shared valuable insights into predictive analytics, leveraging the capabilities of IBM SPSS Modeler 18.

Additionally, Pre-Conference Workshop 2, titled ‚ÄúR Markdown in Academic Writing‚Äù was led by Mr.¬†Kamarul Ariffin Mansor from Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Kedah. Mr.¬†Kamarul Ariffin Mansor guided participants through the effective use of R Markdown in academic writing, offering practical tips for enhancing the presentation and communication of research findings.

As we gear up for iCMS 2025, our fifth international conference, we are excited to reveal the theme for this edition, ‚ÄúAccelerating Innovation: Navigating the Road to Research Excellence‚Äù. Building on the momentum of the previous conference‚Äôs theme, ‚ÄúDriving Research Toward Excellence,‚Äù we aim to further explore the rapid advancements in computing, mathematics, and statistics across various facets of life. We firmly believe that iCMS 2025 will provide an unparalleled platform for researchers to showcase their practical solutions, fostering collaboration, and acting as a catalyst for stimulating innovative ideas that will shape the future of research and advancements. Join us in this journey towards excellence at iCMS 2025!




Organized by:




Supporting partners:

title: iCMS 2024
text:
CALL FOR PAPERS

The Faculty of Computer and Mathematical Sciences of Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Kedah is hosting The 5 International Conference on Computing, Mathematics and Statistics 2021 (iCMS2021). The organizing committee invites academicians, researchers, PhD candidates and practitioners worldwide to submit full papers to the conference.

Important dates
Abstract Submission Deadline: 1 Sept 2024
Notification of Abstract Acceptance: Rolling
Full Paper Submission Deadline: 15 Oct 2024
Camera Ready Paper Deadline: 20 December 2024
Online Registration Deadline: Rolling

Early bird Payments: 1 December 2024
Full Payment Deadline: 15 July 2024

Pre-Conference Workshop Date: 20 January 2025

Conference Date: 21 - 22 January 2025

title: iCMS 2024
text:
WORKSHOPS


Pre-Conference Workshop 1

PREDICTIVE ANALYTICS USING IBM SPSS MODELER 18
Prof.¬†Dr.¬†Yap Bee Wah
Institute for Big Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence
Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Shah Alam



Pre-Conference Workshop 2

R MARKDOWN IN ACADEMIC WRITING
Mr.¬†Kamarul Ariffin Mansor
Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Kedah

Mr.¬†Kamarul Ariffin Mansor, is a senior lecturer at the Faculty of Computer Science and Mathematics, Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM), Kedah Branch Campus, Malaysia. His research interest includes the application of structural equation modeling and statistical applications in other fields of studies, data analytics and visualization using Excel, R, Tableau, etc.

PRE-CONFERENCE WORKSHOP REGISTRATION FORM

PAYMENT DUE : 31st May 2021

Please upload your proof of payment here:

title: About iCMS 2024
text:
The International Conference on Computing, Statistics, and Mathematics (iCMS) has been a biennial gathering since its inception in 2013, and we are thrilled to announce the upcoming iCMS 2024, marking our fifth conference after the successful iCMS 2021. Organized by the Faculty of Computer and Mathematical Sciences at Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Kedah, Malaysia, iCMS continues to be a key forum focusing on the disciplines of computing, mathematics, and statistics, exploring their applications and advancements.

Throughout the years, iCMS has consistently attracted high-quality papers from both local and global contributors, covering a diverse range of subjects within these three domains. Notably, iCMS 2017 achieved significant success with all presented papers published in indexed journals and proceedings. In the subsequent iCMS 2019, over 100 papers were accepted, with a substantial portion published in Scopus indexed journals, and the rest in various other suitable indexed journals.

The organizing committee has also successfully hosted pre-conference workshops, such as the ‚ÄúVisualization of Tidy Data,‚Äù conducted by the internationally renowned expert, Dr.¬†Matthias Templ from Statistics Austria and Vienna University of Technology, garnering positive feedback from participants.

In our previous conference, iCMS 2021, we celebrated a significant milestone and expanded our offerings with the successful inclusion of two pre-conference workshops. Pre-Conference Workshop 1, titled ‚ÄúPredictive Analytics using IBM SPSS Modeller 18‚Äù was conducted by Prof.¬†Dr.¬†Yap Bee Wah from the Institute for Big Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence at Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Shah Alam. Prof.¬†Dr.¬†Yap shared valuable insights into predictive analytics, leveraging the capabilities of IBM SPSS Modeler 18.

Additionally, Pre-Conference Workshop 2, titled ‚ÄúR Markdown in Academic Writing‚Äù was led by Mr.¬†Kamarul Ariffin Mansor from Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) Kedah. Mr.¬†Kamarul Ariffin Mansor guided participants through the effective use of R Markdown in academic writing, offering practical tips for enhancing the presentation and communication of research findings.

As we gear up for iCMS 2024, our fifth international conference, we are excited to reveal the theme for this edition, ‚ÄúAccelerating Innovation: Navigating the Road to Research Excellence‚Äù. Building on the momentum of the previous conference‚Äôs theme, ‚ÄúDriving Research Toward Excellence,‚Äù we aim to further explore the rapid advancements in computing, mathematics, and statistics across various facets of life. We firmly believe that iCMS 2024 will provide an unparalleled platform for researchers to showcase their practical solutions, fostering collaboration, and acting as a catalyst for stimulating innovative ideas that will shape the future of research and advancements. Join us in this journey towards excellence at iCMS 2024!




Organized by:




Supporting partners:

text:
Authors are required to submit abstracts, full papers, and camera-ready papers separately using the confBay conference management system. Kindly click on the confBay icon below to go to the submission page. You have to create a confBay account first before you are allowed to log in to the submission page.

To register for conference, please click the icon below:
